title: 讚掦信 - 商台晴朗潘小濤

replies.msg:
認同請SEND封信讚下潘小濤

To: sales@cri.com.hk;cs@881903.com
Letter of Gratitude and Compliment to Mr. 潘小濤
Dear Sir / Madam,

We are a group of loyal supporters and audience of the Commercial Radio Hong Kong (“CRHK”). We recently learn that Mr. Poon Siu To (潘小濤), an experienced journalist and one of the seasoned hosts for talk shows / chat shows, namely On a Clear Day (在晴朗的一天出發), Sino Stream (串), Sino Stream – Reading (讀懂中國) and Global Frontline (國際線), has resigned and will be retained in a limited capability for the CRHK broadcast team.

It saddens us as Mr. Poon has been hosting some of the above radio programs for more than a decade. Given his journalistic background, Mr. Poon has persistently contributed and shared with us his observations and insight into daily social and political issues surrounding us. We find him unique among the broadcast hosts serving CRHK. To replace his role by another host with comparable experience is impossible and unconvincing.

Mr. Poon’s presence in the CRHK broadcast team, is thus a considerable reason why we continue to subscribe for the CRHK monthly subscription package. The number of followers in his Facebook page offers a solid indicator as to his popularity.

We believe that CRHK delivers its audience with something more than entertainment and news reporting. Undoubtedly, Mr. Poon is one of the reasons for the CRHK’s uniqueness.

Yours faithfully,
[xxx]
